tasks.label: Start PostgreSQL Service
tasks.command: docker compose -f ${workspaceFolder}${pathSeparator}backend${pathSeparator}docker-compose.dev.yml up -d db mq flower

tasks.label: Stop PostgreSQL Service
tasks.command: docker compose -f ${workspaceFolder}${pathSeparator}backend${pathSeparator}docker-compose.dev.yml down db mq flower

tasks.label: wait-mq-db
args: until nc -z 127.0.0.1 5672; do echo waiting for mq; sleep 1; done; until nc -z 127.0.0.1 5432; do echo waiting for db; sleep 1; done
